citations.narrative:
The licensee did not have a Record of Animals on Hand. This record discloses animals that are acquired, owned, held,
leased or those that are sold, euthanized, or otherwise disposed of by the dealer. This information assists the USDA with
tracebacks, disease investigations, and to assess animal welfare at a facility.
To be corrected by: 5 NOV 2020
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
End Section

narrative:
2.75(b)(2) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
The licensee did not have a Record of Animals on Hand.  This record discloses animals that are acquired, owned, held, 
leased or those that are sold, euthanized, or otherwise disposed of by the dealer.   This information assists the USDA with 
tracebacks, disease investigations, and to assess animal welfare at a facility. 
To be corrected by:  5 NOV 2020 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives. 
 
End Section
